title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: fancy compound satin
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Irregular broad stripes of blue satin and white taffeta.  Undulating stems and flowers in blue and bunched of polychrome flowers formed by extra wars on the white taffeta stripes.
